snippet.title: Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse ... 2024!
snippet.description: Okay, this is taking longer than we thought. Sam & Max: The Devil's Playhouse Remastered is ALMOST DONE, but won't be ready until 2024, so we updated the teaser. Wishlist it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2648050/Sam__Max_The_Devils_Playhouse
